html:
4.15.17  11:22 am   Did you have something in mind for the video immediately after HOTEWIG? I know you want to do music more (and a balance of music and videos) but I couldn't remember if you wanted the next video to be music.

     i have still not figured out a balance for how many songs will have videos, but there will surely be videos on many of the songs. so the next video will certainly be a song video, whether or not there are other songs without videos that come out before then. once i get the schedule under control, i will figure out what else i am doing for non-song videos. there are lot of possibilities there too, but i need to get the songs under control first

4.15.17  11:14 am   thoughts on the merits of linguistic prescriptivism?

     sometimes u gotta just go in and prescribe the shit outta some linguistics

4.15.17  11:07 am   How can you anwser questions 24/7?

     i can't
4.15.17  11:05 am   hello how is it going ; do you like maths ?

4.15.17  11:02 am   Will the new video be on YouTube or your website first? How will it be announced?

     it will go to both places at the same time. i will likely do a tweet relating to it, very similarly to the way i announced history of japan. also likely the same type of thing on instagram as i did with history of japan. possibly other things too as well, i'm not sure

4.15.17  10:55 am   hi, same dude that hopes you answer all his questions. How can i know if i deserve someone's attention?

     you just need to be how you want. and others will decide if they want to pay attention to you
4.15.17  10:43 am   Boxers or briefs?

4.15.17  10:34 am   in total, how many hints will you release on your instagram?

     i don't know

4.15.17  9:35 am   Are you still making videos now?

      have been making music and/or videos non-stop since 2014, and will continue doing so for a long, long time

4.15.17  9:29 am   What is a 'world' to you?

     everything is worlds. sometimes it seems like there's worlds all over the place

4.15.17  9:18 am   is it true that you used to be a music teacher.

     no

     if so how was it

4.15.17  8:49 am   What is your opinion on interpretive dance?

     if you don't know what something is, you can always interpret it as dance
4.15.17  8:31 am   why aren't you answering my question

4.15.17  6:39 am   will you ever make your own advertisement?

     i prefer advertising things that people already have. that way i just tricked you into wanting what you have. surprise, now you have what you want

4.15.17  5:54 am   can you even?

     i am trying
4.15.17  5:39 am   would you be open to be commissioned for a long song?
4.15.17  5:39 am   What happened in the time between "history of japan" and "thinkin bout doin some content"?

4.15.17  5:36 am   what's your compositiion process like in regards to things like harmonisation and voicings and such? is it more theory-focused kinda like a puzzle, or do you just feel it out, or are you already so fluent in the theory that it all just kinda comes out naturally? you have 4-second jingles with more harmonic complexity than anything i could write, and it's amazing to me.

     i just try to use me best judgement

4.15.17  5:21 am   why can't you give a proper answer?

     i'm just trying to be reasonable

4.15.17  4:46 am   Say a pun about yourself. It has to be goooooood.

     https://twitter.com/billwurtz/status/606648145250906112

4.15.17  4:43 am   what do you think happens after death

     it depends what happened before death

4.15.17  4:43 am   would you want to become an astronaut, astrophysicist, or other jobs related to space if given the chance?

     not right now

4.15.17  4:38 am   if the times on the questions are the times you answer them,

     they are not

     why do you answer at odd intervals

4.15.17  4:37 am   do you think time travel can happen other than us traveling forward in time at a regular pace? im talking like time traveling to the past where you can meet your younger self or become your younger self

     i think it's a little more crazy than that

4.15.17  4:35 am   do you know the countries malaysia and brunei and is either of them in your video

     sort of

4.15.17  4:33 am   do you feel a lot more educated by making videos on history

     yes, particularly about history
4.15.17  4:30 am   tell us something special about yourself
4.15.17  4:29 am   what subject were you best at in school

4.15.17  3:56 am   hi, i'm the dude who hoped you could answer all his questions. How do you know why can someone feel proud of someone else?

     you just have to guess

4.15.17  3:55 am   if someone put drugs in your drink without u knowing and u drank it will you be addicted to the drugs or addicted to the drink

     most drugs aren't instantly addictive the first time

4.15.17  3:28 am   will hotewig be released between now and the end of time?

     oh hell yeah

4.15.17  3:22 am   What time is this millennium?

     it's going on right now

4.15.17  3:20 am   can you give me a very detailed story of your life

     i feel like i have done that many times, especially on this questions page

4.15.17  3:19 am   Is this the end?

     it is the end of some things, the beginning of other things, and right in the middle of some things
4.15.17  3:08 am   What do you think of pineapple pizza?

4.15.17  2:45 am   Why can communism never prevail?

     i guess it's too boring

4.15.17  2:19 am   Do u know how to rwite ? xD

     yes
4.15.17  2:02 am   what's your favourite pizza topping?

4.15.17  1:40 am   will the recent pull on ads keep you from uploading your newest video?

     no, i never used ads
4.15.17  1:39 am   okay, you cleverly avoided giving a proper answer to my last question. what is your favourite album?

4.15.17  1:38 am   we miss you, but do you miss me?

     who is this
4.15.17  1:34 am   How can I be sure you aren't asking yourself all these questions?

4.15.17  1:26 am   Is HOTEWIG gonna be out by next week

     that would be nice
4.15.17  12:09 am   have you ever had an existential crisis?

4.15.17  12:03 am   I'm probably gonna write a lot of questions, mostly to find any kind of answer to a problem in my head, are you willing to answer all of them?

     i'll try to answer as many as i can

     you'll know it's me because ill let you know in the question, i don't know, i just hope to have answers

4.14.17  11:42 pm   have you finished the score?

     yes. but i am going to make some corrections, especially near the beginning

4.14.17  11:41 pm   what hour of day are you most likely to upload your new video?

     i'm not sure but i think 12:00noon UTC would be a good time
4.14.17  11:17 pm   What Are Your Thoughts On Uppercase Letters?
4.14.17  11:06 pm   WHY DON'T YOU USE CAPITALIZATION?

4.14.17  10:51 pm   Do you have a beard?

     no
